page.title: 08MY HOUSE IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: MY HOUSE IS AT 21 CASTLEREAGH CLOSE. IT IS{SEMI-DETACHED}AND NEXT DOOR TO THE GARAGE.IT IS OFF THE MAIN ROAD THROUGH LONGNEWTON AND NEAR TO THE{A66 BY-PASS. {DOWNSTAIRS}THERE IS A{HALL}WITH A CUPBOARD,A{LOUNGE},A{KITCHEN}AND A {CONSERVATORY.}IN THE LOUNGE WE HAVE A TELEVISION AND A SETTEE.THERE IS ALSO A FIREPLACE.IN THE{KITCHEN}THERE IS A COOKER AND A SINK AND PLENTY OF CUPBOARDS.NEXT IS THE CONSERVATORY WHERE MUM KEEPS HER PLANTS.WE HAVE A {UTILITY ROOM}WHERE WE HAVE OUR WASHING MACHINE AND TUMBLE DRIER. {UPSTAIRS,}WE HAVE 3{BEDROOMS,}A {BATHROOM}AND A TOILET.IN OUR BEDROOMS WE HAVE BEDS,WARDROBES AND DRAWERS IN OUR{GARDEN}WE HAVE A PATIO,A BARBACUE AND LOTS OF FLOWERS.
